component.name: Custom Scrollbar
component.description: A customizable scrollbar component that replaces default browser scrollbars with stylized alternatives. Supports vertical and horizontal scrolling with custom colors, widths, and animation effects while maintaining full accessibility and smooth scrolling performance.

variants.name: Material Design
variants.description: A polished implementation of the custom scrollbar featuring modern styling, smooth animations, and intuitive hover effects with visual feedback. Provides excellent visibility and precise scroll position indicators for improved user navigation experience across all browsers.

variants.name: Glassmorphism
variants.description: Custom Scrollbar implementation in Glassmorphism style

variants.name: Neon Cyberpunk
variants.description: Custom Scrollbar implementation in Neon Cyberpunk style

variants.name: Minimal Flat
variants.description: Custom Scrollbar implementation in Minimal Flat style

variants.name: Gradient Rainbow
variants.description: Custom Scrollbar implementation in Gradient Rainbow style
